website_summaries.verdict: This table makes up for its lack of space with uncomplicated stylish looks, nice quality, and a surprisingly low price that proves you can have attractive furniture without breaking your budget.
pros: A sturdy little table with a rich brown finish that is both classic and modern
Falls on the lower end of the price scale for coffee tables in its class
cons: It's a small table, but if your budget is your top priority, you may not mind
Rare reports of missing screws upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Corner
customer_reviews.text: If you have a smaller room, this is the perfect coffee table. I had a big rectangular table that I loved, but it was just too big for the space. This table is the perfect size, and takes up even less space because of its shape. Assembly was easy, it took me about 20 min to put together. The color is rich and beautiful, and the construction is solid. Although the table is smaller, there is still a lot of surface area for things. Overall great table.
customer_reviews.author: Karenina

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, please use coasters...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, and shape. Easy assembly. I waxed it before use just to protect it. Right off the bat I had company sit a glass/cup on it and it without using the multitude of coasters in the room, and it left a ring. Good place to set a decorative bowl. ): Although a water ring is not the fault of the table, I have rescued glasses off other tables and inserted a coaster, and not ended up with damage. This was quickly damaged and I don't know why. It is overall a very nice table, it has been sturdy. If I have to refinish it someday, so be it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: You Winsome, You lose some... this was a definite win though!
customer_reviews.text: Flat-pack furniture for less than $100 is always a gamble. It's either pretty good, or starts to break after a while... or sometimes during assembly. Not the case here! WOW was I surprised to find that these tables are made of real wood (I mean it might be veneer) with pretty hefty craftsmanship (I can stand on it no problems) and a pretty durable finish. This is in our "man cave" and has had everything from bourbon to hot sauce spilled on it. After over a year, the stain and varnish are still in great shape and clean up like new. As others have said, this is pretty Red for an 'espresso' finish, but I really didn't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Gyakusetsu

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than anticipated but great overall.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this coffee table for our living room. We have three young children so we did not want anything very expensive because our kids destroy things very fast. Despite the low price, it is attractive and stylish, but smaller than I expected. Keep in mind when you assemble this that there are some sharp edges around the woods seams on the inner edge of the table. I cut my finger pretty good while putting it together. Ouch! Besides that it's a great piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 058674G38XEOG93475

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table for a small space. Wish it came in 36" size, but the 30" works. The woodgrain shows and the color is rich. Minus one star for a damaged table that had to be replaced. The packaging is barely sufficient and it was annoying to have to return the first table and wait for the replacement. Amazon took care of everything for me as always, but since the reviews indicate previously damaged tables, it's surprising they don't improve the packaging. I love the table now that it's here, however, so all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Berkshires

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! It's gone through a lot with my 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! It's gone through a lot with my 3 year old. He plays his toys on it, runs his cars over it, climbs and jumps from it, spills his juice over it, leaves his play doh on it...and it looks just as good as the day I got it! The color is still in tact and smooth. The legs hold up pretty well and has not wobbled even after constant pulling of the table for relocation.
customer_reviews.author: DMAC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy BUT
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is beautiful. No nicks or scratches. Heavy and sturdy. Not small or huge just the right size BUT one of the pieces was not packaged properly and came broken in two. I reached out to customer service and they responded very quickly; however, I just received the tracking information for the broken piece today when I submitted the request for replacement a week ago. That would not be an issue if delivery date was not until next week. So I will have an incomplete table in my newly decorated living room for another week! The table is great quality I just wished that all the pieces were packaged properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. For the money it’s a great deal. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. They included one extra piece each of the hardware. Nice touch. The finish on the top isn’t spectacular but again, for the money it’s about what I expected. All in all a good value. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: jwm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Winsome
customer_reviews.text: This is the third winsome wood purchase I have made and I'm just as happy with it as I am the rest. I've also purchased the matching end table. These tables are so nice for the price! Solid wood, sturdy construction that is pretty easy to put together. We are purchasing a piece of glass to go over the top to protect the integrity of,the wood. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieReviews

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: Great table, solid construction. This is a heavy little table that went together easy and is great looking. I thought it would be made of composite material. To my surprise it was solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: thefenceguy

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This compact sized cocktail fits perfectly in my living room. It arrived promptly and went together very easily in about fifteen minutes. I will be ordering the matching round end table as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Buy this coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this table. Took me 15 minutes to put together. Beautiful heavy all wood table. Made in Malaysia. I have found furniture made in Malaysia or Thailand is usually always wood and made very well. Price was great for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Put a 5' Christmas tree on this table. It is nice enough to replace our current coffee table when the season is over. Assembly was just OK. There is tension between the legs and the underside bars. I did split the wood on one of the underside bars where the two bars join in the center. Hairline crack, easily fixed with wood glue and clamps. The table is very stable and will not wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: table is great but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: So it came damaged... Have to send it back to be replaced. ERRGGG.. after putting the darn thing together. the table itself is cute worth the low price , it is simple small and lightweight. BUt have to deal with ordering it multiple times to get it not damaged. It was not the shipping fault either it was packaged damaged. Where is the QC?
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: great but..
customer_reviews.text: This table is really nice for a small place. I have a small apartment and an l shaped couch so it works perfectly. It arrived quick and has no damage. Set up was easy except one leg did not fit in the knotch so I had to screw on a diagonal because I do not feel like returning this. Overall, its a cute table that does not wobble and does its job. The misaligned knotch is the only thing keeping me from giving it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy, looks great, and is exactly what we needed. Our usual coffee table was too large for our little one learning to walk. We needed an inexpensive option to use until she is steadier and less likely to tumble and bump her head. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MelanieNichole

customer_reviews.title: Decent round table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Table is as shown in pics. Put it together in about 20 mins. Really easy and fit together great. Only issue I can find is the top grain is pretty rough and looks like a cheaper plywood veneer stained but not sanded as smooth as it could be. Since I needed a round table and couldn't find anything local to purchase, this was a pretty good alternative for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linnae

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe how cute this table is!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how cute this table is for the price. I Needed a table ASAP after puppy chewed other more expensive table. This was delivered fast, super easy to put together. Nice size for a petite size sectional.
customer_reviews.author: R. Montesano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small/medium size living room with a rather large sectional. Round is perfect for in front of the sectional - room to walk, doesn't block the seating. I also like the color - just as description says...espresso and it is, it matches my other pieces. All the coffee tables i have had in the past were always square or rectangle, with the corners....i was forever walking into them and had permanent bruises. The round...no corners, no bruising :) Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lentine

customer_reviews.title: Basic table
customer_reviews.text: Pretty plain, but serves it purpose in the family room.
customer_reviews.author: Rebaperson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful table at a reasonable price! Purchased a small dark brown sectional, and this table compliments it 100%!!! Not too large, not too small, and not difficult to put together! Very attractive table, looks just like the pictures. Would most definitely recommend. Also, was shipped super fast!!! Smiles all around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together. Very nice and looks even better in person. Almost a 5 star product. The only issue was that it did not come with the 8 philips screws listed so I had to use my own. other than that, great product. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Reasonably priced and looks more expensive. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: M. Lefevre

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee table for function and looks
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table for function and looks. It is actually beautiful. Nice weight and can fit into a smaller space for a sectional. And a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: great small size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table to fit with an L-shaped sectional. This works great! I did spray it with polyurethane since the stain didn't look long-lasting
customer_reviews.author: Lexington13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and surpassed all my expectations! Looks like a much more expensive piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Love it! Easy even for me to put together about 30 minutes but Im not good at assembling things! For the average person should only take 10 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent little coffee table, well constructed and very easy to put together. Great finish. altogether satisfactory in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd W. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee table. Heavy and sturdy. Also a lot larger than it looked like in the pictures posted by other buyers. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Turner

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very well made table. Very sturdy, and easy to put together. The wood is strong and sleek looking, and the color is spot on. The hardware is easy to install, and they include extra L-bracket supports (which we did not even use) to hold the table together. This will definitely stand up to rough boys in the house!
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed, very durable. Looks more expensive than what it cost.
customer_reviews.author: LEWHALEN314

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. It was easy to assemble with no missing parts. On time with no damage and good quality for the price. Fits nicely in a small living room or game room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but came damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the table is great, besides the fact that it came damaged in few places. One of the legs was damaged due to which the table wobbles a little. The top also has few scratches here and there. It still looks good in my living room. However, I expected a new table to look and feel new as well.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: For the price this table is great. Easy to put together and study. The top of durable and is still scratch free after 3 months of use bu my 6 year old. Took about 15 mins to put together.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just what I needed, good quality for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: TWhite

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, easy to put together, and seemingly well made.
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted minus the scratch
customer_reviews.text: Table was perfect size. All pieces were received but had a scratch on the side. I read other reviews with the same problem. Unfortunately for us, we do not want to go with the hassle of pulling apart and returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Purchased used
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice coffee table. We are using it with an L shaped couch in our family/playroom. I don't think it would work as well in front of a regular three seat couch. I'm not sure the $10 off for the used version was worth the 5-7 small dents and dings. It was shipped very quickly, extremely easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material, wood, nice color, easy to assemble. Great fit for small rooms. We loved it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Harutyunyan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. Simple but elegant
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Simple but elegant. Assembles easily. As with all this type of furniture, the nice finish is delicate and can be easily damaged.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWart

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! It's sturdy wood and beautiful and only took me 15 minutes to assemble!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a well made table!
customer_reviews.text: This little table is just perfect and priced right. It’s sturdy and has character. I’m not handy but I was able to follow the directions and assemble it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble and looks beautiful; not too big for a room, but effective for your needs
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the table
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the table ,it's great for our l/r .The table is wood that was a plus for me ,I love it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda farlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the size and quality of this coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! Perfect table for the price. Nice and sturdy plus the rounded edges are great for our 10 month old who is just learning to pull up.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Goid quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality table at a much lower price than similar products!
customer_reviews.author: worm

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: The table came cracked on the top and 2 of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Garner

customer_reviews.title: This table is a great addition to our living room
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great addition to our living room. Easy to put together, color is accurate as pictured, espresso dark.. Price is also affordable.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy little table.
customer_reviews.text: I am horrible at assembling furniture, yet managed to put this together in 35 minutes with no help and no difficulty. It looks to be a decent, sturdy little piece of furniture. I wouldn't stack tons of crap on it, but it will do for a regular coffee table, and as a place to put my laptop while watching movies on the couch at night. For the sale price ($95.55), I think it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: great item!
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend this table. very easy to assemble and looks great...sturdy and great size.
customer_reviews.author: Txrider

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my living room, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Super easy to put together, and it's very sturdy. For the price I was expecting a cheaper build, but it's real wood and holds up well. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. A simple, sturdy coffee table. Well made and well packaged. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and really nice quality. Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and well-made table
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and well-made table! Quality wood, real-wood joints, and good-quality hardware. About 20 minutes to assemble with easy directions.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Lisnoff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: This table was very easy to assemble. Directions were precise and all the pieces were included in the package. The table was very nicely finished and looks beautiful. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Baily

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful-Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Quick service-Wonderful quality-perfect dimensions listed on site and rich dark cherry/mahogany mix of color-just like this picture but even better. The legs have a neat curvature that I missed in the Amazon pic, but in person looks reall cool. Easy to assemble! I totally recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Brau

customer_reviews.title: beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: nice table - well built - solid wood. looks great in my office
customer_reviews.author: DMJ4Truth

customer_reviews.title: Came in pretty mint condition
customer_reviews.text: This table was actually nicer than I expected. Sleek, light weight and a clean line. Came in pretty mint condition!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: New addition to the home
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my living room. Its sterdy and the color goes well with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Goes perfect with my couches and small enough not to over ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the matching end table for living room. Goes perfect with my couches and small enough not to over power the rest of the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Gnomee

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: Dont expect solid wood but for our needs, it is perfect. Was not disappointing. Even bought the end tables recommended with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, cute.
customer_reviews.text: this table was very easy to put together. It's very cute. Water marks show up so you should always use a coaster!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Actually a good little table!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Screws together very solid and stays sturdy. Pretty good quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: sue do nim

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price. It is fairly small but we needed a smaller one, since our new living room is kinda small.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Eighmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nicely made table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nicely made table. Shipping no scratches no chips. Perfect fit for in fron of my love seat. Great price for a well made table!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, works well and what was to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, loved it :)
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture. Just loved it. Fits perfect in my living room. Looks expensive than its actual price. Looks same in actual as what is shown in the photo. I will definitely recommend this coffee table to people looking for decent piece of furniture for smaller living rooms.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great table at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table, solid wood, very easy to assemble. Well packed, clear instructions for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Guest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, simplicity of assembly, and how it looks. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Malia

customer_reviews.title: Table came quickly and was in very good condition. Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Table came quickly and was in very good condition. Very good quality for the price. Very Happy with the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT BARR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time searching for a smallish, round, modern-style, dark brown coffee table that I could actually afford. I am so happy I finally found this one. You really shouldn't be able to expect something this good for $80-$90.
customer_reviews.author: Bendy McFicklesteen

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Wood Toby Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice and was easy to put together. The wood is nice and sturdy. The only complaint I have about the table is when I put my feet on top of it the wood looks dull right away, but furniture polish brings it back to new right away. For the price it is very nice and I would recommend it to anyone who is limited on space.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Abelman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, solid wood and easy to assemble! Deep wood color looks very rich and expensive even though it is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality wood, easy to assemble. Only wish they sold the pie shaped insets for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bino

customer_reviews.title: Not very tall, the measurements are accurate but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very tall, the measurements are accurate but I think it looks small because it is made of a thinner wood.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wiens

customer_reviews.title: great table, more of a red espresso
customer_reviews.text: The table I received is, a very sturdy, nice table, which was easy to assemble. I have one word of caution though. The picture for the table must have been taken low lighting, because that is what the table looks like in a dim room. In a well lit room the table is actually more of a mahogany/ espresso, which is actually nicer then the black/ espresso. Just not the color I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This table is very nice. Nice price. Nice quality. It is a small coffee table, perfect for my cozy space.
customer_reviews.author: R. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and looks really nice in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new coffee table that was safer for little ones. This one fit the bill. Easy to put together and looks really nice in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this coffee table. It's the perfect size for me and is very stable. The top finish did scratch somewhat easily, so just be careful when setting things on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for a small space and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price & solid wood. Table is just as pictured with very easy assembly. Just the table I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff B. Clendenen

customer_reviews.title: very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: fit perfectly in my apt.!!! very easy to assemble,I just loved it!highly recommended to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: GLO

customer_reviews.title: The table was easy to put together and looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to put together and looks really nice. I used my own screwdriver only because I can't handle the tiny Allen key. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Looks Expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality table, and very nice for the price! It's pretty sturdy and the perfect size for my basement living room. The only issue I have is that the stain on top seems to be thin and a bit faded. Other than that, this is a great little table! I'd definitely recommend this product ~
customer_reviews.author: JanAnn

customer_reviews.title: coffee table perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table--it is just the right size! It was fairly easy to assemble too! I just had to have someone finish screwing in the bolts for me. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: youngster11

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. It is sturdy and looks great. I love the dark wood and it matches my living room well. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Terry

customer_reviews.title: Lighter and Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: A darker, richer finish would make this table look nicer. It is lighter than I expected and has quite a few noticeable imperfections on the main surface. Also, I expected it to be a bit bigger, but that is my fault for not measuring. I would not order this again and I would not recommend this table. Noteworthy is that my co-workers have said it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and sturdiness for the price! Perfect size for the space.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Winsome and Losesome
customer_reviews.text: The table looks exactly as pictured, so if you like what's in the picture then you'll be happy with the actual product. However, the packing materials are not adequately secured and in my case one of the foam pieces got dislodged from the edge of the table and the table was dented during shipping. This could have been prevented if the padding was simply glued to the outside box.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little coffee table! I live in a studio apartment and it fits perfectly into my space! With a little knowledge of how a screwdriver works, assembly is a breeze! I have had it for four months now and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Zickert

customer_reviews.title: Every thing to like!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it, quality furniture, I live In a 1939 bungalow and my living room is compact so this table is ideal plus it Looka great!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Toby Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price! So hard to find a 30" coffee table and this one fits perfectly. Nothing damaged in shipment, easy assembly and all pieces were there!
customer_reviews.author: nd2012

customer_reviews.title: Solid & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Small coffee table comes on a box. The pieces are in good condition and easy to assemble. Solid and sturdy. Fit the purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Boulangere Twee

customer_reviews.title: so frustrating so sad. cos I really need a coffee table asap
customer_reviews.text: recieved and I I llike it and I'm so excited to assemble only to find out missing 3pairs of Gscrews how could that be...so frustrating so sad.cos I really need a coffee table asap.so how can I assemble this now.Cos I want it now
customer_reviews.author: chi

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and large enough to act impromptu dining table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table because of the price and it's simple design. It's sturdy and large enough to act impromptu dining table. My only issue is that finish has peeled in a few places and there are scratches. I am happy with this table!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This table was easy to build, and has a lovely rich color. It arrived in great shape; even though the box was dented the table was unmarked. It is slightly wobbly on our apartment's pergo floor, but will work just fine. I bet it would be even better on carpet. It is our first day with it, but so far I feel like it is nicer than I expected from the picture and price.
customer_reviews.author: M.E. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this table. It was easy to assemble, and the wood quality was very nice, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HillsideHaven

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee table with the two matching end tables. They look great. The coffee table (and end tables) are greet quality. Nicely built.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

product_meta.title: Winsome Toby Table, Espresso
product_meta.description: The slightly flared legs and rich dark Espresso finish on this table give it a subtle elegance that will enrich the living room, bedroom or entry. There are many possibilities and uses for this classic table.
feature_bullets: 30-Inch Surface, Beveled top adds to rich look
Easy to assemble with parts and tools included
